name: Gas City "Pre-Alpha" JetPack PC Build
description:
PRE-ALPHA EXPERIMENTAL RELEASE :-)

This is a pre-alpha build of Gas City for PC that features a flying camera.  The Camera is first person POV, essentially just a moving camera that lets you explore the city from the air. 

This build is really to showcase Gas City without being limited by ground-based avatar movement. Build 2.04 is our Pre-Alpha therefore it lacks many of the features of the Android / PC Alpha Demo build. 

Also, because the Avatar has been replaced with a flying camera many features of this build won't work if an avatar is required to interact with the feature. 

There lots of known issues with this build, however, enjoy seeing the foundation of the Gas City Metaverse from the sky.  :-)

We know that this is probably all new to you but Gasflip puts our fans, customers, and supporters first, and for this release event, that means you get to look at this demo which is pre-release code. Consider this Flying Demo a behind the scenes peek at the city from the air,  and we're ok with showing you something we love despite the rough edges. Join our Patreon (patreon.com/gasflip) if you want to see more of our early release prototypes. Thank you so much!
